meanings.definition: Relating to a government or society in which honor is the dominant factor in the ruling class.
meanings.sent1: The timocratic leaders were respected for their honorable actions.
meanings.sent2: In a timocratic society, honor holds great importance in leadership.
meanings.sent3: The timocratic council decided to award medals for acts of bravery.
meanings.sent4: Her timocratic nature shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The timocratic culture valued integrity above all else.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a system of government based on the possession of property.
meanings.sent1: Their timocratic society valued land ownership above all else.
meanings.sent2: In a timocratic government, property ownership determines power.
meanings.sent3: The timocratic community held an annual property fair.
meanings.sent4: His timocratic mindset saw possessions as a measure of success.
meanings.sent5: The timocratic system thrived on the ownership of resources.
